Beaclon
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Monster Rancher DS: Monster Rancher DS FAQ: Unlocking the 12 Locked Breeds: Beaclon
By Thorr on Tuesday, August 10, 2010 - 07:07 am:

Breeder Rank: D
Monster Rank: D
Location: Beach in the Summer only (Months 6-8)

Guide your monster to the beach in the southwest corner. There you will find a beaclon who wants to arm-wrestle. There is a 90% chance of success if your Power is over 90. Win the match and the beaclon will give you a Pupa for use in combining and Beaclon will be unlocked.

WARNING! We believe that if you lose to the Beaclon in arm wrestling you have lost your chance forever. Therefore, we recommend using a throwaway monster that you don't care about to perform this task. This way, if you fail, you can reset your game to the last save and not worry about the resulting effects of the reset on the monster.
